Authenticate with the Contiguity API usi: Authenticate with the Contiguity API using a revocable key. Create one at console.contiguity.com/dashboard/tokens
Make a custom API call to a specific end: Make a custom API call to a specific endpoint
Enter the recipient's phone number in in: Enter the recipient's phone number in international format with no spaces, following this pattern: [+][Country Code][Subscriber Number]. For example, +12065551234.
Authorization headers are injected autom: Authorization headers are injected automatically from your connection.
Enable for files like PDFs, images, etc..
HEAD: HEAD
